title: Extract Business Emails from Google Maps Listings for Lead Generation
description:
This workflow scrapes Google Maps business listings (e.g., carpenters in Tarragona) to extract websites and email addresses ‚Äî perfect for lead generation, local business prospecting, or agency outreach.

üîß How it works

Manual Trigger ‚Äì start manually using the ‚ÄúTest Workflow‚Äù button.

Scrape Google Maps ‚Äì fetches the HTML from a Google Maps search URL.

Extract URLs ‚Äì parses all business links from the page.

Filter Google URLs ‚Äì removes unwanted Google/tracking links.

Remove Duplicates + Limit ‚Äì keeps unique websites (default: 100).

Scrape Site ‚Äì fetches each website‚Äôs HTML.

Extract Emails ‚Äì detects valid email addresses.

Filter Out Empties & Split Out ‚Äì isolates each valid email per site.

(Optional) Add to Google Sheet ‚Äì appends results to your Sheet.

üíº Use cases

Local business leads: find emails of carpenters, dentists, gyms, etc., in your city.

Agency outreach: collect websites and contact emails to pitch marketing services.

B2B prospecting: identify businesses by niche and region for targeted campaigns.

üß© Requirements

n8n instance with HTTP Request and Code nodes enabled.

(Optional) Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials.

Tip: Add a ‚ÄúGoogle Sheets ‚Üí Append Row‚Äù node and connect it to your account.

üîí Security

No personal or sensitive data included ‚Äî only credential references.
If sharing this workflow, anonymize the ‚Äúcredentials‚Äù field before publishing.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
